report.query:
SELECT DISTINCT branch.EVENT, branch.CATEGORY, (SELECT region_name FROM cms_region WHERE id = branch.PARTY_REGION ) AS PARTYREGION, (SELECT region_name FROM cms_region WHERE id = branch.RM_REGION ) AS RMREGION, branch.LINE_NO, branch.LIMIT_RELEASED_AMOUNT, branch.SERIAL_NO, (SELECT user_name FROM cms_user WHERE login_id = branch.CASE_RM ) AS CASERM, (SELECT rm_mgr_name FROM cms_relationship_mgr WHERE id = branch.PARTY_RM ) AS PARTYRM, branch.CASE_NO, branch.PARTY_NAME, branch.PARTY_ID, (SELECT entry_name FROM common_code_category_entry WHERE category_code = 'HDFC_SEGMENT' AND entry_code = branch.CUSTOMER_SEGMENT ) AS CUSTOMERSEGMENT, branch.ActualCaseReceivedDateBR, branch.ActualCaseReceivedTimeBR, branch.ActualCaseProcessedDateBR, branch.ActualCaseProcessedTimeBR, CAL_DIFF_DATE(branch.CaseReceivedDateBR, branch.CaseReceivedTimeBR, branch.CaseProcessedDateBR, branch.CaseProcessedTimeBR, (SELECT start_timing FROM cms_tat_master WHERE event_code =branch.event ), (SELECT end_timing FROM cms_tat_master WHERE event_code = branch.event ), ( (to_date(branch.CaseProcessedDateBR,'DD-MM-YYYY') - to_date(branch.CaseReceivedDateBR,'DD-MM-YYYY')) -
(COALESCE ( (SELECT SUM((TRUNC(end_date) -TRUNC(start_date)+1)- (next_day(TRUNC(end_date), 'MONDAY')-next_day(TRUNC(start_date), 'MONDAY'))/7 ) FROM cms_holiday h WHERE TRUNC(h.start_date) BETWEEN to_date(TO_CHAR(branch.CaseReceivedDateBR),'DD-MM-YYYY') AND to_date(TO_CHAR(branch.CaseProcessedDateBR),'DD-MM-YYYY') OR TRUNC(h.end_date) BETWEEN to_date(TO_CHAR(branch.CaseReceivedDateBR),'DD-MM-YYYY') AND to_date(TO_CHAR(branch.CaseProcessedDateBR),'DD-MM-YYYY') ),0)
+
COALESCE ((select (next_day(to_date(TO_CHAR(abc.CaseProcessedDateBR),'DD-MM-YYYY'), 'MONDAY')-next_day(to_date(TO_CHAR(abc.CaseReceivedDateBR),'DD-MM-YYYY'), 'MONDAY'))/7 from tat_rpt_for_Branch abc where abc.case_No = branch.Case_no),0)
)
) * ((to_date(CaseProcessedDateBR || ' ' || (SELECT end_timing FROM cms_tat_master WHERE event_code = branch.event ), 'dd-mm-yyyy HH24:MI') - to_date(CaseProcessedDateBR || ' ' || (SELECT start_timing FROM cms_tat_master WHERE event_code = branch.event ), 'dd-mm-yyyy HH24:MI') )*24 )) AS TotalTime
FROM TAT_RPT_FOR_BRANCH branch, sci_le_sub_profile sp
